A class representing a gpu program.

Attach

public void Attach( Shader shader );
Attaches a shader to the program.
Parameters:
shader - The shader to attach.

Create

Link

public void Link();
Links the program.

Uniform1f

public void Uniform1f( const string& name, float value );
Sets a 1d uniform float.
Parameters:
name - The name of the variable.
value - The value to assign for it.

Uniform1i

public void Uniform1i( const string& name, int value );
Sets a 1d uniform integer.
Parameters:
name - The name of the variable.
value - The value to assign for it.

Use

public void Use( bool useShaders = true );
Uses the program.
Parameters:
useShaders - Default to true. when set to false the rendering reverts to the fixed functionality pipeline.
